pr_title: GEODE-8016: publish with non-zero-padded build ids instead of SNAPSHOT.

timeline.bodyText: Can we use 1.14.0 here instead of an old version?
timeline.author: dickcav

replies.bodyText: Yes. I'll change it during the rebase (rebasing due to conflict).
replies.author: rhoughton-pivot

timeline.bodyText: We don't use these other releaseQualifiers so can we remove them?
timeline.author: dickcav
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,13 +22,11 @@
 # The releaseQualifier uses the following conventions:

replies.bodyText: Can, but I'm not ready to as part of this change.
replies.author: rhoughton-pivot

timeline.bodyText: just to confirm, was this change intended, or "debugging" that accidentally got left in?
timeline.author: onichols-pivotal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@
 # See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 # limitations under the License.
 
-set -e
+set -ex

replies.bodyText: It was, and leaks no secrets.
replies.author: rhoughton-pivot

timeline.message:
GEODE-8016: publish with non-zero-padded build ids instead of SNAPSHOT.

* Artifacts take the form `1.13.0-build.123` instead of `1.13.0-SNAPSHOT`.
* checkPom task has been modified to use a slug instead of an always
changing version.
* Gradle clients will use the greedy "1.13.0-build+" notation
* Maven clients will use semver v1.0 "[1.13.0-build,1.14.0)" notation.

Signed-off-by: Sean Goller <sgoller@pivotal.io>

GEODE-8016: publish with non-zero-padded build ids instead of SNAPSHOT.

* Artifacts take the form `1.13.0-build.123` instead of `1.13.0-SNAPSHOT`.
* checkPom task has been modified to use a slug instead of an always
changing version.
* Gradle clients will use the greedy "1.13.0-build+" notation
* Maven clients will use semver v1.0 "[1.13.0-build,1.14.0)" notation.

Signed-off-by: Sean Goller <sgoller@pivotal.io>
